Package wtf.choco.veinminer.api

Class ClientActivation

java.lang.Object
wtf.choco.veinminer.api.ClientActivation
public final class ClientActivation
extends Object
A utility class for client-sided integration.

  • Method Details

    • isUsingClientMod

      public static boolean isUsingClientMod​(@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Check whether or not the given player is using the client-sided vein miner mod.
      Parameters:
      player - the player to check
      Returns:
      true if using the mod, false otherwise

    • setUsingClientMod

      public static void setUsingClientMod​(@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.entity.Player player, boolean using)
      set whether or not the given player is using the client-sided vein miner mod. This method is meant to be called internally and should not be called by plugins.
      Parameters:
      player - the player to set
      using - the new use state

    • getPlayersUsingClientMod

      public static int getPlayersUsingClientMod()
      Get the amount of players using the client mod.
      Returns:
      the players

    • isActivatedOnClient

      public static boolean isActivatedOnClient​(@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Check whether or not the player has pressed the vein miner activation key.
      Parameters:
      player - the player to check
      Returns:
      true if activated, false otherwise

    • setActivatedOnClient

      public static void setActivatedOnClient​(@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.entity.Player player, boolean activated)
      Set whether or not the player has pressed the vein miner activation key. This method is meant to be called internally and should not be called by plugins.
      Parameters:
      player - the player to set
      activated - the new activation state
